column5: Here is a pic of a nice 8 pointer, got him to walk into within 20' of me. I am sure he could hear my heartbeat, I know that I could hear him panting. If ever there was to be a case of Buck Fever, that would have been it. Clean and fast, no tracking to be done. The other one is a nice little doe I got out of a tree stand at 80 yards with my boss's 12 ga It had a red dot scope on it and I was impressed at how accurate it was. (heart shot) Got both of these deer last year in Kirkfield.  Didn't get to go this year.  Stan
Isn't it more humane to just shoot them?
THATS funny!!I dont care who you are!!Nice deer! Joe
I didn't even know they made deer snares.

You guys are wayyyyy to funny!! Feel free to lose this pic if you feel so inclined. Today was the last day for hunting with slugs in my WMU and I was thinking about deer (the four legged variety) Did anyone else have any luck this year?

My bud's dad's deer from 2 weekends ago. Not a biggun, but he was happy.   Another buds deer last monday, rattled it in. Could only see the head and neck through the trees.   My best bud's deer, yesterday.
Here's a pic of our camps rifle season deer.
LOL    Here's mine for this year.
Good stuff guys.Tjsa,that last pic is a hoss!! Joe
Nice meat!  Daplumma, show me that picture you have for your icon of the little racoon.  Pam
racoon
this is my 8 pt from last season.  our shotgun season doesnt start for another week.  cant wait.  jason
here i am with mine, a 9 pt.,   beside a 7pt. and we also got an 8pt easlier in the week

All I can say is, WOW all nice deer.Congrats to all those that were succesful in your harvest.  I went 0-1 last weekend at pops.  Im down to the rest of the season with the bow.MAN I WISH IT WOULD GET COLD AND SNOW.   Hey Duber,thats one nice meat hanger dude.
Jason,That looks like nice midwestern deer.Good job. Joe

this is a nice buck an amish man took opening day of bow season.  the deer was killed about 10 miles from my farm.  it should be #2 all time in ohio after it dries.  the only kicker is due to his religion hes not allowed to market the rack, or be photographed with it.  jason
Thats a killer Non typical Jason.Them midwest and Canadian deer grow big.Not like those Texas runts with nothing but antlers. Joe
With all these great deer shots I thought I`d add mine from a couple of weeks ago..  Here you go.......  enjoy and thanks for looking    Doug
Our group got 8 this year, pics to come!
nice deer shot this year wow
Awesome deer guys! Hopefully, I will have a picture to add to this collection soon.  Praying for snow, like other bow hunters...

Just read oxcowboys post/pic...and man, I respect the deer and the guy that got it...if it were me, I'm afraid I might be clicking away with the camera and looking for a new religion.  Amish are admirable people.
Gee it must be getting close to Christmas with all of you putting up the tree ornaments! LOL  Nice Pics!
WOW...those are some great hunting pics guys you all did very well and will have fresh deer for a while....yummmmmyyyy.....
